description:
Set in a beautiful night time city, take to the streets and try to pass all the missions. Drifting around the courses is a satisfying experience, especially when you hook up all the turns and make a perfect run to score the best rewards for your achievement.

Taking the massive motorhome and long caravan around the same tight corners presents a totally different challenge, but if you can handle all the situations thrown at you, you will be proved as the ultimate driver!

Share the roads with other vehicles, but donâ€™t crash into them! 

GAME FEATURES:
- IMPRESSIVE CAR COLLECTION: Drift & Drive 10 Awesome Cars in all categories.
- EASY TO HANDLE DRIFTING: Drift like an expert around the city streets!
- PRO PARKING MISSIONS: Huge campaign to beat, earn in-game money to unlock new cars for your Garage.
- REAL TIME TRAFFIC: Dynamic moving traffic, which responds to your driving.
- AWESOME GRAPHICS: Colorful and detailed night time environment.
- CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view for full immersion.

This game will test ALL your driving ability... precision, speed, control, reversing, parking and navigation. All combine to make the ultimate driving simulator challenge!
name: Drift & Drive
